input.sentences: we went out to support our friend .
he was playing tonight with a band .
the band looked great on stage .
the audience really enjoyed the music .
we were very proud of our friend .
output.sentences: Last Friday, three friends went out to an a music club.
The first band played a great rock and roll set.
The next band played some great variety music.
The audience really enjoyed all of the great music.
They enjoyed the evening a lot, and even made new friends.
